text: The N Seoul Tower (), officially the YTN Seoul Tower and commonly known as Namsan Tower or Seoul Tower, is a large tower in South Korea. It is part of Seoul. The country can be viewed from the tower, making it a tourist attaction. It is tall. It has cafes and observatories in it. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:Skyscrapers in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Seoul Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 20th century
title: N Seoul Tower
